document.full_text: the mother of retired boxing champion micky ward, whose story was turned into the hollywood movie "the fighter," died on wednesday at the age of 79, her son said.
document.title: feisty boxing mom portrayed in "the fighter" dies
lines_and_colors: the mother of retired boxing champion micky ward, whose story was turned into the hollywood movie "the fighter," died on wednesday at the age of 79, her son said.
